wikipedia_page.main: Leslie Brown (27 November 1936 – 28 January 2021) was an English association football midfielder. He was part of the Great Britain team at the 1960 Summer Olympics, but he did not play in any matches. He later became an entrepreneur. He died on 28 January 2021 at the age of 84.

response: * Leslie Brown (RAF officer) (1893–1978), Royal Air Force officer who served in World War II
* Leslie Brown (bowls), Fijian bowls player, medallist at 1950 British Empire Games
* Leslie Brown (English footballer) (1936–2021), English football midfielder
* Darby Brown (1929–1988, born Leslie Brown), Australian boxer of the 1940s and 1950s
* Leslie Brown (Scottish footballer), Scottish footballer of the 1950s
* Leslie Browne (born 1957), American ballet dancer and actress
